name: Conversations With My Anxiety
description:
Conversations With My Anxiety is a story-based game about a first date. During that date, the player will recede into his mind and have a conversation with his anxiety. Depending on how your conversation with your anxiety plays out will determine the course of the date!

The game is short and sweet.  It only takes around 5 to 10 minutes to finish the game so I hope you check it out! 

Conversation system was built with Yarn Spinner!

https://yarnspinner.dev/
